doc.field: Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Records of New Perspectives on Caribbean Studies: Toward the 21st Century and Prospects for Caribbean Basin Integration(Conference held at Hunter College, CUNY, August 28-September 1, 1984)
Series XVI. Audio and Video Recordings, August 1984 - March 1985
Series XVI. Audio and Video Recordings, August 1984 - March 1985

Approximately 2 linear feet (2 Paige boxes). This series contains 26 videotapes, 26 digibeta copies of the videotapes as well as 26 DVD copies of videotapes, 60 original audiotapes and 60 CD copies of original audiotapes. All tapes are arranged in numerical sequence. The videotapes are labeled with the prefix "68768" followed by the tape number (i.e.68768/1). The inventory treats the second number as the tape number. Series XVII. Digitized Audio and Video Recordings and Transcripts contains digitized copies of these audio and video recordings, transcripts, and indices to the audio and video transcripts.
